thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 18 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Intercontinental Exchange And Blockstream Launch Consolidated Data Feed For Cryptocurrencies

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Intercontinental Exchange And Blockstream Launch Consolidated Data Feed For Cryptocurrencies
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Intercontinental Exchange Inc:
* INTERCONTINENTAL EXCHANGE AND BLOCKSTREAM LAUNCH CONSOLIDATED DATA FEED FOR CRYPTOCURRENCIES
* INTERCONTINENTAL EXCHANGE SAYS CO, BLOCKSTREAM ANNOUNCED LAUNCH OF CRYPTOCURRENCY DATA FEED
* INTERCONTINENTAL EXCHANGE - AGREEMENT BETWEEN ICE DATA SERVICES, BLOCKSTREAM OFFERS COVERAGE OF PRICES & ORDER BOOK DATA FOR BITCOIN, OTHER CRYPTOCURRENCIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
